verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker] reuben spread my daughter shared this recipe with me for a hearty spread that tastes just like a reuben sandwich serve it from a slow cooker set to warm so that it stays tasty and warm —rosalie fuchs paynesville minnesota kielbasi
